description:
Stay warm and dry when it matters most. The Heat Reflective Poncho keeps rain and wind out, and your body heat in. Traditional survival blankets require you to hold them close to your body, trapping the heat in but limiting your mobility, a poncho allows you to move towards shelter without losing your precious body heat. The roomy design accommodates most packs, to keep your gear dry.

  • Vacuum-metalized polyethylene reflects 90% of your body heat, and stretches without shredding like Mylar®
  • Thermally bonded seams are strong and leakproof
  • Tough material is reusable
  • High-viz orange exterior
  • Folded dimensions: 10 x 4 x 16cm
name: Survive Outdoors Longer Heat Reflective Poncho
